definition: Styrax officinalis or Styrax benzoin/benzoin resin (used in TCM)/Benzoinum
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

Styracaceae, tree family including silver-bell, snowdrop and benzoin

sentences.english: A new species of Styracaceae from China.
sentences.chinese: 中國安息香科的一個新種。

sentences.english: Pollen morphology of Styracaceae and its taxonomic significance.
sentences.chinese: 安息香科的花粉形態研究及其在分類上的意義。

sentences.english: Other fixatives which may be used include the oleoresins such as benzoin, or styrax.
sentences.chinese: 其他可用的固定劑有苯偶姻或安息香等含油樹脂。

sentences.english: The partially separation of benzoin and dansyl-amino acids were also achieved.
sentences.chinese: 對安息香和氨基酸衍生物對映異構體能部分分離。

sentences.english: Styrax chinensis and its forestation techniques.
sentences.chinese: 中華安息香及其造林技術。

sentences.english: Paint one side of washer with benzoin and apply this side to skin.
sentences.chinese: 將洗滌器的一面塗上安息香並將它貼到皮膚上。

sentences.english: Other fixatives which may be used include the oleoresins such as benzoin , or styrax.
sentences.chinese: 其他可用的固定劑有苯偶姻或安息香等含油樹脂。
